get.summary: Search for both creative and editorial images

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Accept-Language parameter optional. Used to restrict the set of natural languages that are preferred as a response to the request.

parameters.name: Api-Key
parameters.description: Api-Key

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization token optional. Used for applying content access restrictions. Use one of the OAuth2 grants to auto-populate this value.

parameters.name: collections_filter_type
parameters.description: Allows searching based on included or excluded collections.

parameters.name: collection_codes
parameters.description: Allows filtering by collection code.

parameters.name: embed_content_only
parameters.description: Include only images that are embeddable. The default is false.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: If specified, include only images created on or before this date.

parameters.name: exclude_nudity
parameters.description: Exclude images tagged as containing nudity. The default is false.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields. Allows restricting which fields are returned. If no fields are selected, the summary_set of fields are returned.

parameters.name: file_types
parameters.description: Identifies a file type for the image.

parameters.name: graphical_styles
parameters.description: Identifies a graphical style for the image.

parameters.name: keyword_ids
parameters.description: Comma separated-list of keyword IDs.  If specified, returns images containing the requested keyword(s).  If keyword IDs and phrase are both specified, returns only those images matching the query phrase which also contain the requested keyword(s).

parameters.name: license_models
parameters.description: Identifies a licensing model for the image.

parameters.name: orientations
parameters.description: Choose images based on their aspect ratios.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Size of page.

parameters.name: phrase
parameters.description: Free-text search query.

parameters.name: product_offerings
parameters.description: Allows filtering by product offering.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Allows sorting of results.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: If specified, include only images created on or after this date.

6003.description: Invalid date format, must be like YYYY-MM-DD

6005.description: Statistics need to be generated, please try again later
